mapper.select: select s.file_name fileName, s.ctl_context ctlContext, i.tns_url tnsUrl from t_import_subtask s inner join t_import_sqlldr_info i on s.sqlldr_info_id = i.sqlldr_info_id inner join t_import_task t on s.task_id = t.task_id where t.task_status = #{taskStatus}
mapper.delete:
delete from t_import_subtask
or id like #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_import_subtask (id, subtask_id, sqlldr_info_id, task_id, file_name, ctl_context) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subtaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlldrInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctlContext,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into t_import_subtask
id,
subtask_id,
sqlldr_info_id,
task_id,
file_name,
ctl_context,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{subtaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sqlldrInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_import_subtask
subtask_id = #{subtaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sqlldr_info_id = #{sqlldrInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ctl_context = #{ctlContext,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_import_subtask set subtask_id = #{subtaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sqlldr_info_id = #{sqlldrInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctl_context = #{ctlContext,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
